title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 600.11 - Additional rules relating to criminal appeals
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 600.11 - Additional rules relating to criminal appeals

State Regulations
(a) Transcript of proceedings. Where an appeal in a criminal matter is prosecuted on
the original record or by the appendix method, the appellant shall serve a copy
of the transcript of the proceedings upon the respondent together with the
brief and appendix, and cause a copy to be filed with the
court. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22
ยง
600.11

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
